title: Need a few more players for a serious ranked team (Silver, Gold)
body:
Hey guys my IGN is pezzy I'm a silver player looking to start a ranked team in the silver to gold range
if you're interested post fill out the following and ill get back to you. If we get good enough id love to join a tournament on Battlefly http://battlefy.com/ward-up

PLEASE DO NOT JUST ADD ME AND NOT SAY ANYTHING
Skype is nessassary

IGN:

Skype:

Age:

Main Role:

Main Champion:

How often you're on:

Rank:

Why you want to play for my team:

replies.body:
IGN: jojolojo
Skype: liammail93
Age: 22
Main Role: Jgl/mid
Main Champ: varies but at the moment in mid: azir, diana, zed, fizz, lissandra, ori, twisted fate, 
Jgl: lee, sej, amumu, vi, j4, 
I'm happy to learn other champs
How often i'm on: a lot largely every day
rank: silver 5 but in norms i'm matched with gold/plats
why team: I've always wanted to try a team environment and see what its like to play on a team

IGN: ShuffledPancake

Skype: DaPuncake

Age: 15 LOL

Main Role: Support (can do jg/top)

Main Champion: Nami  (Zyra aswell)

How often you're on: Everyday, Weekdays : 3:50Pm-9Pm

Rank: S5 (Promos S4)

Why you want to play for my team: Looking to make Friends/Rank up/Find a Good team.

Now dont get it {{champion:4}}  just bcz im 15 (LOL) Doesnt mean i cant be serious

IGN: Fire Flareon

Skype: FireFlareon

Age: 23

Main Role support

Main Champion: Sona

How often you're on: all day tuesday wendsday thursday saturday and mornings only friday sunday monday

Rank: Bronze 1 

Why you want to play for my team: Because you arent demanding diamond 5 or higher like alot of other teams recruiting

IGN: TouchMyKimchi
 
Skype: tba in game
 
Age: 30
 
Main Role: Anywhere 
 
Main Champion: Any
 
How often you're on: Erryday
 
Rank: B5
 
Why you want to play for my team: Because my Swaggoh can not be contained any longer

AND:   Skype is "nessassary"

IGN: Toot Toot

Skype: kevanmay

Age: 20

Main Role: Top (I am practising ADC steadily)

Main Champion: Renekton

How often you're on: All day every day

Rank: Silver II according to OP.GG I have Gold V MMR

Why you want to play for my team: Looking for a serious team to work together and have fun :)
I would join but i'm b3
